resources.string:
This app contains fast flashing images.

It may cause discomfort and trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy

View discretion is advised.

morse code is a method used in telecommunication to encode text \ characters as standardized sequences of two different signal durations, called dots and dashes, \ or dits and dahs.\n\nsource: wikipedia

Proficiency in Morse code is measured in how many words per \ minute someone can send or receive. This seems a tricky concept given that you can send more \ short words per minute than long ones. The work-around is to standardise on the word "PARIS" as \ the standard word, so if Morse is being sent at 20 words per minute (or "20 wpm") then the word \ "PARIS" (or, more precisely "PARIS " with a space on the end) could be sent 20 times in a \ minute.\n\nSource: MorseCode.world
Unknown issue occurred. Returning to menu
Input contains not supported characters. Supported characters are
This value can\'t be empty. Please insert text
Insert text which you want to morse with your phones flashlight

Morse code is send as a blinking light. Your chosen difficult level will \ determine is the morse one letter, one word or multiple words.
The blinking speed is determined \ by your wpm setting. For beginners wpm: 2 is recommended.
The game will end when the limit of \ available questions is reached or timer reaches 0. You can still answer the last question after \ time is up.

To alter the settings go to options from the start screen -> options

This game mode lets you send morse code with your phones flashlight. Check \ that no app is using the flashlight before you play e.g. camera.

 Speed of the flash is \ determined by wpm setting that you can alter from options but the max wpm is limited to 5.

\ To alter the settings go to options from the start screen -> options
